alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 28 at 3:42AM AKDT until October 28 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Aleutians. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 4 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A deepening low pressure system moves north of the Aleutian Chain through Friday. Strong winds on the backside of the low will increase to hurricane force along the Central Aleutians by Friday morning. Winds will quickly diminish Friday evening as the low moves east towards the Gulf of Alaska.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
